ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: hearkening to its Lord as it is bound to do!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and hearkens to the command of its Lord, doing what it should.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: in obedience to the commands of its Lord which are incumbent on it, (the human being will receive due recompense for his deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And it listens to the command of its Lord – and that befits it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And listens to and obeys its Lord -- and it must do so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And obeys its Lord and it must.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and gives ear to its Lord, and is fitly disposed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And attentive to her Lord in fear!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and obeys its Lord as it must,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And it hearkeneth to its Lord, and is duteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and gives ear to its Lord as it should.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord,- and it must needs (do so);- (then will come Home the full reality).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And listens and obeys its Lord, and it must do so;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: obeying its Lord, as it must do!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And hearkens to its Lord, as it must.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:5] and heeds, [and] in this respect, gives ear to and obeys, its Lord, as it should: all of this will be on the Day of Resurrection (the response to idhā, ‘when’, and [to] all that is supplemented thereto, has been omitted; but it is indicated by what follows it, and is implied to be [something like] laqiya’l-insānu ‘amalahu, ‘man will encounter his deeds’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And attentive) and obeys and listens (to her Lord in fear!) and it behoves her do so.
